sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { UilSun, UilSunset, } from "@iconscout/react-unicons"; import { formatToLocalTime,iconUrlFromCode } from '../../services/WeatherService'; function Image({ weather: { details, icon, temp, wind, temp_min, temp_max, sunrise, sunset, speed, humidity, feels_like, timezone, name, }, }) { return (

{city}:

{details}

Wind

{`${speed.toFixed()} km/h`}

Temperature

{`${temp.toFixed()}°`}

Humidity

{`${humidity.toFixed()}`}

{/* hgdfls hvdloxjf */}

Rise:{" "} {formatToLocalTime(sunrise, timezone, "hh:mm a")}

|

Set:{" "} {formatToLocalTime(sunset, timezone, "hh:mm a")}

|

High:{" "} {`${temp_max.toFixed()}°`}

|

Low:{" "} {`${temp_min.toFixed()}°`}

) } export default Image;
